original_text: I have heard the reproach of Moab, and the revilings of the children of Ammon, whereby they have reproached my people, and magnified themselves against their border.
korean_text: 내가 모압의 비방과 암몬 자손이 조롱하는 말을 들었나니 그들이 내 백성을 비방하고 자기들의 경계에 대하여 교만하였느니라

sentences.original_text: I have heard the reproach of Moab
and the revilings of the children of Ammon
whereby they have reproached my people
and magnified themselves against their border
